parameter.name: valetpin
parameter.label: Valet PIN
parameter.description: PIN to use when enabling Valet Mode

parameter.name: allowWakeup
parameter.label: Allow Wake-Up
parameter.description: Allows waking up the vehicle. Caution: This can result in huge vampire drain!

parameter.name: allowWakeupForCommands
parameter.label: Allow Wake-Up For Commands
parameter.description: Allows waking up the vehicle, when commands are sent to it. Execution of commands will be delayed in this case and you could cause the vehicle to stay awake very long.

parameter.name: enableEvents
parameter.label: Enable Events
parameter.description: Enable the event stream for the vehicle

parameter.name: inactivity
parameter.label: Inactivity Interval
parameter.description: The inactivity period in minutes, after which the binding stops for 20 minutes to let the car sleep.

parameter.name: useDriveState
parameter.label: Use Drive State for Inactivity
parameter.description: Use the drive state instead of location to determine vehicle inactivity.

parameter.name: useAdvancedStatesForPolling
parameter.label: Use Console Modes and Occupancy for Inactivity
parameter.description: Use these states to help continue the fast polling of the API. Do not back off polling if in these states.
